title: "Machine-Learning Program Connects to Human Brain and Commands Robots"
excerpt: "Researchers at Ecole Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne have developed a machine-learning program that can be connected to a human brain and used to command a robot. The program can alter the robot’s movements based on electrical signals from the brain."
